import { Dialog as TwDialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' const Dialog = props => { const { dialogTitle, actionBtnText, cancelBtnText, link, children, closeModal } = props const [ isOpen ] = useState(true) return ( <>
{dialogTitle} {children}
{actionBtnText}
) } export default Dialog
